programme.desc: The crew of Era Alaska provide aid to a village devastated by flooding. Two pilots get lost off the Russian coast while delivering ammunition, and Jims Cessna 180 goes up in smoke

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The anglers travel to Australia in search of barramundi, a fish that is almost impossible to find in the wild - until their Aboriginal guides take them to a barra paradise

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Basketball legend Dwight Howard needs the team at ATM to design and build a habitat for all 14 of his snakes. He also requests a reptile mansion

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: Members of the team rescue a cat trapped in a drain deep underground, and help an abandoned dog in danger of freezing to death

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia

programme.desc: The threat of flooding prompts Tia to make an evacuation plan for her and the dogs. Joe feels a special bond with an injured dog he rescues from the streets

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Era Alaska has a special canine delivery for Iditarod champion Lance Mackey. Plus, Jim and Ferno cope with the airlines busiest day of the year

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Fierce winds cause chaos for small planes on Halloween, while Ariel has to cope during a blackout

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Warden Benge returns to work after a life-threatening injury. Along the coast, fishermen get caught with too many sharks and a protected turtle gets relocated

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr Amy meets Bobo the cat, who is badly wounded after a fight, and staff from animal control bring in neglected dog Juicy

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson is in Louisiana to take on his biggest treehouse ever, which will be made up of three separate levels and involves building a 70ft bridge

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: A jetboat captain is forced to spring into action as a rafter topples into the murky waters of the river. Elsewhere, heavy rain threatens to destroy Aubreys ranch

programme.sub-title: The Day the Buffalo Broke Free
programme.desc: Tensions flare when Otto and Jane head to Kodiak Island to rescue a herd of wild buffalo. Plus, Shane makes progress on his long-overdue cabin

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Browns prepare for a medieval-themed birthday celebration for Baby Eli. Later, they complete the main house before a huge wildfire strikes

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Port Lockroy on Goudier Island in the British Antarctic Territory is the site of one of the worlds most remote post offices, which has a staff of four and is open to visiting tourists during the Antarctic summer. They share the neighbourhood with more than 3,000 gentoo penguins, and this documentary follows the trials and tribulations of the birds as they try to raise their chicks in these unusual surroundings. Juliet Stevenson narrates

programme.title: The Mirror Crackd
programme.desc: Miss Marple investigates a murder on a film set starring feuding Hollywood stars Marina Rudd and Lola Brewster. When a local woman dies after drinking a poisoned cocktail made for Marina, everyone assumes the actress was the intended victim because she had received death threats. However, the sleuthing spinster is not convinced. Agatha Christie mystery, with Angela Lansbury, Elizabeth Taylor, Kim Novak and Rock Hudson

programme.title: Angela Lansbury at the NFT
programme.desc: Actress Angela Lansbury talks to American columnist Rex Reed and answers questions from members of the audience at Londons National Film Theatre. First broadcast 26 September 1973

programme.title: Mercury Prize 2025: Album of the Year
programme.desc: Lauren Laverne presents coverage of the awards ceremony from Newcastles Utilita Arena, celebrating each of the 12 nominated albums through live performances before announcing the overall winner. The shortlisted artists are CMAT, Emma-Jean Thackray, FKA twigs, Fontaines DC, Jacob Alon, Joe Webb, Martin Carthy, Pa Salieu, PinkPantheress, Pulp, Sam Fender and Wolf Alice

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Two criminal brothers discover the orphanage where they were raised faces closure unless the nuns who run it can pay their tax bill, so the pair embark on an urgent mission to revive their old blues band to raise the money needed. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Aretha Franklin, James Brown, Ray Charles, Cab Calloway, Carrie Fisher, John Candy and John Lee Hooker

programme.title: How to Get Ahead
programme.desc: The three-part documentary continues as writer and broadcaster Stephen Smith explores Renaissance Florence under the reign of Grand Duke Cosimo Medici, whose fledgling court prized the finer things in life. Successful courtiers had to have brains as well as brawn, and some looked to theorists like Niccolo Machiavelli for underhand ways to get ahead, while enlightened polymaths turned their minds to the heavens - and to ice-cream

programme.title: Angela Lansbury at the NFT
programme.desc: Actress Angela Lansbury talks to American columnist Rex Reed and answers questions from members of the audience at Londons National Film Theatre. First broadcast 26 September 1973

programme.title: Blood and Gold: The Making of Spain with Simon Sebag Montefiore
programme.desc: The historian uncovers the truth about Spains hero El Cid. He also investigates the attack on the city-state of Granada, waged by King Ferdinand and Queen Isabella, the horror of the Spanish Inquisition, and in the process discovers an unsettling story about one of his own ancestors

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jo Whiley presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 7 August 1998 and featuring Ace of Base, Lucid, Brandy and Monica, Baby Bumps, Puff Daddy featuring Jimmy Page, Apollo 440 and Spice Girls

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jayne Middlemiss presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 14 August 1998. Featuring Apollo 440, Hinda Hicks, Sash! featuring Tina Cousins, Solid Harmonie, Placebo, Will Smith, Fun Lovin Criminals and Boyzone

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Andy Peebles presents an edition first broadcast on October 11, 1979. Includes performances by the Dooleys, the Headboys, Chic, Dr Hook, Viola Wills, the Charlie Daniels Band, Errol Dunkley, Cats UK, Dave Edmunds, Dana and the Police. Plus, dance sequences by Legs and Co

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Simon Bates and Steve Wright present the pop chart programme, first broadcast on October 16. Featuring performances by Pet Shop Boys, Cliff Richard and Sarah Brightman, Boris Gardiner, Marti Webb, Paul Hardcastle, Nick Berry and Status Quo

programme.title: Country Queens at the BBC
programme.desc: A compilation of archive performances by female country-music stars from a variety of BBC studio shows. Featured acts include Bobbie Gentry, Anne Murray, Emmylou Harris, Taylor Swift, Crystal Gayle, Tammy Wynette, Billie Jo Spears, and Lucinda Williams with Mary Chapin Carpenter

programme.title: Coolidge and Kristofferson: Sounds Like Friday
programme.desc: An evening of song hosted by Kris Kristofferson and Rita Coolidge. With Billy Swan and Barbara Carroll. First broadcast 29 September 1978

programme.title: Tammy
programme.desc: Tammy is joined on stage at the Maltings Concert Hall by guests Richard Harding, Johnny McEvoy, The Tennessee Gentlemen and The Bill Clarke Five. Songs include Staying Home Woman, I Dont Wanna Play House, Ways to Love a Man and Golden Ring. First broadcast 7 September 1977

programme.title: Sisters in Country: Dolly, Linda and Emmylou
programme.desc: How Dolly Parton, Linda Ronstadt and Emmylou Harriss careers took off in the 1970s with very distinct takes on country music, before they came together to collaborate on a successful album in 1987. The artists talk about uniting as harmony singers, focusing on how their alliance made them pioneers in bringing different music worlds together and raising the game for women in the country tradition. Narrated by KT Tunstall

programme.title: Country Queens at the BBC
programme.desc: A compilation of archive performances by female country-music stars from a variety of BBC studio shows. Featured acts include Bobbie Gentry, Anne Murray, Emmylou Harris, Taylor Swift, Crystal Gayle, Tammy Wynette, Billie Jo Spears, and Lucinda Williams with Mary Chapin Carpenter

programme.title: Coolidge and Kristofferson: Sounds Like Friday
programme.desc: An evening of song hosted by Kris Kristofferson and Rita Coolidge. With Billy Swan and Barbara Carroll. First broadcast 29 September 1978

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jo Whiley presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 7 August 1998 and featuring Ace of Base, Lucid, Brandy and Monica, Baby Bumps, Puff Daddy featuring Jimmy Page, Apollo 440 and Spice Girls

programme.title: Top of the Pops

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Kimberley Walsh host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: Presenters Rav Wilding and Jennifer Reoch revisit a 1998 case in which 16-year-old Carmel Fenech disappeared without a trace. Plus, how a duo of determined detectives caught a man guilty of attempted rape

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Tommy Walsh heads to in Rugeley, Staffordshire, to see a three-bed mid-terrace bought by a trio of experienced developers. Martin Roberts is in Cudham in the south-east London Borough of Bromley visiting a two-bed end-terrace cottage bought by a mother to help get her daughter on the property ladder. Jacqui Joseph is in north-west London to see two flats that may be better reverting back to one

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion presents the show from Wrexham, where the teams are ably guided around the antiques centre by experts Jonathan Pratt and Tim Weeks, before heading to the auction with Thomas Forrester. Christina monitors events and also discovers the appeal of model railways with an avid collector of original Hornby trains

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: Bike recovery specialist Bilal hunts down a stolen £2,500 e-bike, which has a childs seat on the back. As a father himself, he is determined to get the cycle back. Meanwhile, tracker Richard is searching for a vehicle worth £40,000 stolen off a builders yard in south-west London. Its a race against time as theres a high demand for construction vehicles like this in countries like Ukraine - and thieves are cashing in

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: A scuba team takes on a familys epic 30-year search for a grandfathers mythical missing motorbike. Meanwhile, expert social media detective Mui hunts for clues about a precious ring found on the fells and local crafter Sally is challenged to turn discarded crockery into a ceramic wonder. Presented by Helen Skelton

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Wanting to leave town life behind them, a couple set their sights set on a new countryside home in Northamptonshire, and call upon the services of Ginny Buckley to help them find it. Ginny also discovers a beautiful green space on the outskirts of Kettering, where the towns residents can recharge their minds, bodies and green fingers

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team restores a zoetrope - a groundbreaking form of Victorian entertainment and a precursor to moving film - and a pair of dilapidated designer chairs inherited by the owner when his twin brother emigrated to Florida. Ceramics conservator Kirsten Ramsay is asked to bring a broken little Buddha statue back to life and a woman is keen to see her dads old step-dancing boots as good as new

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Trevor Nelson for the quiz where contestants try to score as few points as possible. As ever, players attempt to come up with the answers no one else could think of

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and Alex Jones host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Gina tries to distract herself and Oscar and Nigel join forces to see out a plan. Johnny realises his mistake

programme.title: Dragons Den
programme.desc: Fashion mogul Emma Grede, CEO of Good American and founding partner of SKIMS, returns as a guest Dragon, joining regulars Peter Jones, Deborah Meaden, Sara Davies, Steven Bartlett and Touker Suleyman. Latest investment suggestions include a headwear brand that trades brollies for bonnets, food-and-drink hampers for every occasion, a mobile grave-tending service and salon-quality hair dye. Hosted by Evan Davis

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the players fall deeper into the game, a new day brings new suspicions among the faithful. The mission forces the celebrities to communicate in a way no one expected and with the murdering hour approaching, the players take their seats at the round table. Will the faithful work as a team to uncover a traitor, or will the traitors power grow stronger? Presented by Claudia Winkleman

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The View
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers reviews the weeks political news, including reports on the latest events at Stormont and Westminster. Plus, comment and analysis with studio guests

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the topical debate from Bishops Stortford, Hertfordshire, inviting a panel of politicians and other guests to answer questions from an invited audience on subjects that have made the headlines over the past week

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: A panel of BBC journalists hosts a weekly round-up from Westminster, delivering the usual mix of serious analysis and light-hearted gossip about the biggest stories in politics. Laura Kuenssberg, Adam Fleming and Chris Mason are among the regular contributors

programme.title: The Weakest Link
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan hosts a battle of the nations special, featuring two contestants from each of the UKs home countries. With Gordon Smart and Amy Macdonald representing Scotland, Paul Brand and Josie DArby playing for Wales, Stephen Mangan and Leomie Anderson for England, and Jamie-Lee ODonnell and Bronagh Waugh representing Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Kimberley Walsh host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: Presenters Rav Wilding and Jennifer Reoch revisit a case from 2024 in which a teenager suffered lifelong injuries after being hit by a speeding car. The driver is yet to be identified. Plus, how Police Scotland smashed a grooming gang

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A seasoned developer renovates house with multiple safety bolts on the front door in Crewe, Cheshire and a father and daughter modernise a property in Doncaster, South Yorkshire. A former estate agent extends and transforms a house in Gravesend, Kent

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Two teams search for money-making items at an antiques fair in Llandeilo, Carmarthenshire, with the help of mentors Izzie Balmer and Richard Madley. Presenter Eric Knowles monitors proceedings and also learns about the centuries-old craft of making chainmail

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: CC Lowsley is totally preoccupied with his upcoming amateur production of The Cursed Arrow. When an actor in the company is murdered, Sister Boniface uncovers a historical motive. Drama, starring Lorna Watson

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is in the Welsh Borders, showcasing some tempting houses to a retired couple who have a whopping £1 million to spend. Along with a characterful property, theyre after somewhere with holiday-let potential or space for a glamping business. Jules is also in his element when he meets experts in traditional construction methods who are keeping heritage building skills alive

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Brenton West, Will Kirk and Suzie Fletcher restore a suit of armour from the 1973 film The Three Musketeers and Walid and Joujou Saad tackle the restoration of a pre-war typewriter brought in by Nicola and her father Joe. Visitor Charlotte brings in a pane of stained glass made by her grandfather and dance teacher Helen is hoping the experts can repair her cowboy boots

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Clara Amfo and JB Gill round off the working week with the usual mix of celebrity guests and stories about people in extraordinary circumstances

programme.title: North Coast Riders
programme.desc: Daily life with the people of Northern Irelands rugged north coast, a place where the ocean meets towering cliffs. High summer finds tourists flooding the beaches, while locals teach, guide, climb and surf. All concerned keep the heartbeat of the coast alive. Then, as summer fades and winter swells, the coast empties. However, the adventure deepens as the locals rise to meet the change of season

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Rafi has been left with brain damage after suddenly falling seriously ill. After spending a year in hospital, he has finally returned home only for it to become apparent the house is not equipped to meet his complex needs. At risk of returning to a medical setting, Rafis loved ones are desperate to keep him by their side, where his recovery has already shown remarkable progress. They turn to Nick Knowles and the team for urgent help to transform their home into a safe haven that will give Rafi the chance to thrive and keep the family together

programme.title: Leonard and Hungry Paul
programme.desc: Thirtysomething Leonards mother dies suddenly and he faces the world with fresh eyes, aware that if hes not careful, hes going to end up living a small life of complete insignificance. His long-term friend and fellow board game-lover Hungry Pauls own universe is exactly the size he wants it to be, but his mother insists he attend the local hospital alongside her as a volunteer visitor. Then, Leonard encounters office fire warden Shelley - who makes him smile for the first time in weeks. Alex Lawther, Laurie Kynaston and Jamie-Lee ODonnell star in this comedy adapted from Ronán Hessions novel and narrated by Julia Roberts

programme.title: Leonard and Hungry Paul
programme.desc: Leonard summons up the courage to talk to Shelley, but a moment of confusion sees him end up on a calamitous date with another woman. However, things subsequently work out for the best and it seems his universe is expanding after all. Across town, Hungry Paul decides to enter an exciting competition. Comedy, narrated by Julia Roberts and starring Alex Lawther, Laurie Kynaston and Jamie-Lee ODonnell

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong hosts, with guest panellists comedian Ross Noble and journalist Helen Lewis joining team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop. As usual, all concerned poke fun at the weeks headlines

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: Rock legend Bruce Springsteen and The Bear star Jeremy Allen White, who plays Bruce in Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere join the host to discuss the biographical movie. Oscar-winner Jennifer Lawrence discusses her role in psychological drama Die My Love and Tessa Thompson reflects on taking the lead in Hedda, a bold re-imagining of Ibsens Hedda Gabler. Plus, Florence + the Machine perform the new single Everybody Scream

programme.title: How Are You? Its Alan (Partridge)
programme.desc: Hosting Saudi Radio alone in a Norwich business park, Alan posits a question - is solitude healthy or do people need others? If not, can dogs or technology fill the void? Steve Coogan stars

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: Actress Jane Horrocks joins the judging panel as Mama Ru tests the queens overacting skills with a series of scripts that pay homage to the UKs famous legacy of bonk-buster fiction. In uncanny timing, Jane, famed for playing the part of hapless PA Bubble in Absolutely Fabulous, is on hand to give her thoughts on a very special Ab Fab runway in A Night of a Thousand Sweetie Darlings. Michelle Visage and Alan Carr complete the judging panel as the queens once again fight for a much-coveted RuPeter badge and survival

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A tribute to formidable nurse Florence Nightingale, aka The Lady with the Lamp, charting how she revolutionised medical care

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: Marvin and Rochelle Humes present a celebrity edition of the music-based quiz show, with contestants Kiri Pritchard-McLean, Lady Leshurr, Shane Richie, Russell Watson, Will Kirk and Shazia Mirza trying to name as many hit songs and artists as possible under intense pressure, with a £10,000 jackpot up for grabs for the charity of their choice. Across three rounds, their knowledge is put to the test, as they attempt to identify huge hits from across the years. Whether its a song from the swinging 60s or the number-one track in todays charts, the teams must prove their ability to recognise songs from all genres of music - from pop to country, rock to RnB and many more

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: A game show in which three teams of contestants have to identify a board full of images, with a chance of winning up to £10,000 if they know them alll. Playing this week are friends from Brighton, sisters from London, and a married couple from North Yorkshire

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: Actress Jane Horrocks joins the judging panel as Mama Ru tests the queens overacting skills with a series of scripts that pay homage to the UKs famous legacy of bonk-buster fiction. In uncanny timing, Jane, famed for playing the part of hapless PA Bubble in Absolutely Fabulous, is on hand to give her thoughts on a very special Ab Fab runway in A Night of a Thousand Sweetie Darlings. Michelle Visage and Alan Carr complete the judging panel as the queens once again fight for a much-coveted RuPeter badge and survival

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabena pulls out all the stops with an elaborate date to win Vanessa back, determined to remind her of what they once shared, and as they reminisce, old feelings resurface. Maurice and Funmis romantic night out falls apart when they cant find a babysitter, forcing them to improvise at home - quietly, cautiously, and with one ear on the baby monitor. Over dinner, Errol finally works up the courage to ask Grace a big question - until Claude and Polly swoop in and ruin the mood. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black

programme.desc: Mush-Mush can’t wait to show his tricks of forest illusion to everyone. / Mush-Mush invents a new game called Fruity Bounce. / When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp. / Because Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are always up to new adventures, Bolly has dubbed them The Adventurers. / Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. / Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables

Mushpot says not to interfere – nature will balance itself out. / Chep wants to return a favour to Mush-Mush, but all Mush-Mush wants is to have a compost pancake on Pancake Day! / When Sushi-Mushi breaks the only spoon he has ever cooked with, he declares his cooking days are over!

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug is unsettled to learn Carrie buys his clothes from an outsize shop, and when she tells him he should lose some weight, a bitter battle of wills ensues. Meanwhile, Arthur wages his own war against neighbourhood thugs with the aid of a limbless mannequin

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie returns to college, but discovers she does not have enough time to work and study. Meanwhile, Doug worries that an educated woman like her will not be interested in a blue-collar man like him. Ricki Lake guest stars

programme.desc: When Robert asks if he can borrow the suitcase sitting on the stairway landing, Ray explains he and Debra have been locked in a two-week battle of wills over who is responsible for putting the item away. Ray Romano and Brad Garrett star

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra and Marie shame Ray into giving Robert a second bachelor party to make up for his disappointing first attempt

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Part one of two. Robert and Amy prepare to tie the knot in a classic Barone family wedding ceremony - but the groom becomes suspicious when his future brother-in-law Peter tries to make peace with both him and Ray. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Brad Garrett

programme.desc: A classy restaurant awards the shrink a place on its wall of fame, but he takes exception to the caricature of himself and tries to persuade the head waiter to replace it with a more flattering likeness. Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce star

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphnes brother turns up at the wedding, bringing nothing with him but an unquenchable thirst for alcohol and a squadron of drinking pals. programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Something Borrowed, Someone Blue - Part One

programme.sub-title: Something Borrowed, Someone Blue - Part Two

programme.desc: Sara Bittorf goes undercover among the workforce of restaurant chain Boston Market, where she is chief brand officer. programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game with Ade Adepitan joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Liv from Wiltshire has been dreaming of owning a holiday home abroad for many years and, after selling her house in the UK, is finally in the position to make it happen. Ben Hillman helps find some suitable abodes on the west coast of Cyprus within her a budget of £87,000 for Liv and her good friend Daisy to consider

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: In Normandy, Louise and Pauls farmhouse transformation moves onto an exciting new stage, while Tracey and Budo unearth some treasures from the past at their hamlet. Meanwhile, Ben and Susana have big plans to transform a previously abandoned area of their village in Galicia

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week takes the BandBers to Ashbourne Holidays in Derbyshire, where deer wander around the grounds and the guests pay a visit to a local animal park

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the penultimate night in Glasgow, 34-year-old catering manager Garry hopes to wow his guests with an exclusive Ibiza Beach Club theme. Theres no expense spared as he treats everyone to his posh nosh, but a blazing row over the use of the term sea bass steak threatens to overshadow his night

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Heather and John love Greece so much that they want their very own characterful bolthole on Crete. Theyve fallen for northern Crete and its easy to see why, thanks to its stunning historic towns, gorgeous coastline and long summer seasons. Jasmine Harman shows the couple five options for their budget of £150,000, from detached delights and ice-cream inspiration to grapevines galore and a quirky courtyard

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: George Clarkes Homes in the Wild
programme.desc: The host travels to the remote Lord Howe Island, a tiny Pacific gem off Australias east coast. Isolated and self-sufficient, the islands residents thrive using its natural resources amid a close-knit community spirit. George explores a remarkable multigenerational renovation - a home built on sweat, ingenuity and a family legacy so moving it brings him to tears. He visits a stunning coastal retreat sought after by the rich and famous, where style meets seclusion, before diving into an ocean paradise where coral gardens line backyards - and friendly turtles virtually mix with humans

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Greg Davies presides as the series enters its second half. Reece Shearsmith builds a ladder out of chopsticks, Ania Magliano lassos a weathervane and Sanjeev Bhaskar attempts to crush an egg. Meanwhile, Alex Horne is forced to give up his prized watch, Phil Elliss sunny disposition costs him dear and Maisie Adam hits a new low

programme.title: How I Made £1 Million in 90 Days
programme.desc: Documentary film-maker Oobah Butler sets himself the challenge of becoming a millionaire, immersing himself in the world of investment and start-ups. Along the way, he meets a range of colourful and questionable characters who offer real insight into how value is created, as he tries to determine how much of the entrepreneurial dream he is being sold is legitimate and how much of it is a bluster of hot-air and delusional self-belief

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts a combination of the comedy panel show and the long-running words-and-numbers quiz, with Jon Richardson and Amy Gledhill taking on Richard Ayoade and Guz Khan. Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while Sam Campbell joins lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to La Grange, a suburb of Chicago, to help the owners of Cafe 36, an upmarket bistro threatening to destroy the marriage of its owners due to the scale of their financial losses. The head chefs attitude to quality control is driving customers away, and it is up to Gordon Ramsay to turn the business around

programme.title: Omen
programme.desc: After years of living in Belgium, a young Congolese man returns to his birthplace of Kinshasa. There he confronts the intricacies of his family and culture as he takes his pregnant fiancee to meet the parents. Drama, starring Marc Zinga and Lucie Debay. In French, Swahili and Lingala

programme.title: The Mustang
programme.desc: Roman Coleman, a violent inmate at a maximum-security prison in Nevada, is given the chance to participate in a rehabilitation therapy programme involving the training of wild mustangs. Director Laure de Clermont-Tonnerres drama, starring Matthias Schoenaerts, Jason Mitchell and Bruce Dern

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: The Professionals
programme.desc: First to host in east London are chef-owner Nina and front of house Chloe of Jellyfish, where they hope that their Lebanese-inspired street food served in one of the areas most popular live music pubs will impress their guests. Second hosts, football mad chef Victor and restaurant owner Ben, of local Italian Bombetta, let the ingredients do the talking with their simple Italian food cooked with love - but with a real Italian coming to visit, will it be enough to impress? Meat-loving Brazilian chef Eduardo and his Italian front of house sidekick Valentina host the final night at their steakhouse, Omnino

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Heather and Tim from Lothianburn enlist the help of the hosts to see if they can improve the seven-acre property they live in or if they should start fresh somewhere new. With Tim hating the dysfunctional layout, lack of storage and inadequate space for working from home Phil looks for a new place that ticks all the boxes. Heather however loves their home and isnt ready to leave considering the work and money theyve put into making it theirs. She asks Kirstie for help renovating, certain she can bring back the joy the couple once felt there

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug decides the family needs a new car, but Carrie urges him not to buy one, afraid an impending strike at his workplace may put a crimp in their finances. Unfortunately, he yields to temptation and splashes out on an expensive off-roader

programme.title: The King of Queens

programme.desc: Debra complains she and Ray do not have any fun together - and persuades him to let her join him in his game of golf. Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton star

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Michael stays home from school for two days in a row, causing Ray to wonder whether he is trying to avoid something. Determined to discover the truth, he deprives the youngster of television, comics and video games to sweat the answer out of him through sheer boredom

programme.desc: A lovestruck Frasier persuades Martin to look round a retirement home because he wants to meet the establishments attractive manager. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney

Marcus disguises himself to work incognito in a teaching kitchen, a food truck business, a culinary institute and a soup kitchen, as he searches for undiscovered chefs to mentor

programme.title: Fawlty Towers: A Very British Comedy
programme.desc: Created by John Cleese and Connie Booth, Fawlty Towers reached heights of popularity few shows at the time could rival. So, why does it only exist in a recut, sanitised and edited form, with some of the original scenes deleted? This programme looks at controversies surrounding the classic comedy, examining its sometimes uncomfortable place in the modern world, using deleted scenes and archival interviews to piece together the story of how a sitcom that seemed untouchable in the 1970s came to be viewed through a more critical lens

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Straight-talking Mel and partner Patrick host night one in the north-east Lincolnshire town of Grimsby with a traditional menu, followed by seasoned ravers Amber and Ryan. Its not long before sparks fly around the table

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

Next to host are childrens entertainer Doug and his ever-tolerant partner Patsy, who combine fine dining with hippy sensibilities, and finally, 22-year-old hip-hop enthusiasts Micaela and Sanchez prepare a menu with a Jamaican-Filipino twist. programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Brooklyn, New York, to tackle a 55-year-old family business. Owner John Esposito left school at the age of 14 and has worked at his parents restaurant, Sals Pizzeria, ever since. Their success meant they could afford to purchase the location next door in the 1990s, naming it Mama Maria after Johns mother, who died in 2002. But when he lost his father as well, John became overwhelmed by the responsibility of running both establishments and his livelihood is at risk

programme.desc: Peralta and Santiago investigate a difficult he said, she said case. Captain Holt becomes suspicious that a cunning escape from jail has taken place after discovering that his lifelong criminal arch-nemesis has died in a prison transport accident

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Spoof behind-the-scenes special exploring what makes the dysfunctional familys antics so popular. Featuring the guest voices of Willie Nelson, Gary Coleman and Stephen Hawking

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge and Lisa turn a sad experience into a graphic novel-turned-Broadway show. But they struggle with creative differences and ego

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard and Bernadette find it upsetting to leave baby Halley at the nursery when Bernadette returns to work at the end of her maternity leave. The gangs university colleague Bert the geologist introduces them to his attractive new girlfriend Rebecca

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard isnt thrilled when he finds out Penny is considering taking a new job that has been offered to her by her former boyfriend Zack. Sheldon attempts to develop his brain further by learning new skills

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Penny and Raj settle into their new living arrangement, but Penny and Raj get along so well together that Leonard starts to feel left out. Sheldon expresses an interest in Amys work and they begin to collaborate on a scientific project

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon pushes himself to the limit when he collaborates on two scientific projects - one with Leonard and Howard, plus another with Amy - on the same day. Bernadette nears the end of her maternity leave, and looks forward to returning to work

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When plans for an outing to the Frying Dutchman are ruined, the family tries to salvage the night by recounting three stories about disasters at sea. One of the tales told is about a fugitive called Homer who delivered the Mayflower safely to the New World

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Girls Just Want to Have Sums
programme.desc: A scandal results in Principal Skinner being replaced by a woman who divides the school in half according to gender, so Lisa poses as a boy to attend maths classes. However, it is not long before she comes to the attention of Bart - who sees through her disguise. With the voice of Frances McDormand

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is forced to eat bland food after he burns his taste buds while trying to copy a fire-eating street performer. He becomes a regular at Springfield Elementarys canteen where he learns a new parenting technique to try out on Bart and Lisa - but its overbearing nature leads to disaster. Meanwhile, Marge enjoys a sauna she discovers in the basement

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer finds himself caught in the throes of a midlife crisis, so he takes up bass guitar and forms a band with some of the other dads in Springfield. However, things get awkward when their singer - none other than Apu - proves so successful that he quickly outgrows the rest of the group, leading to jealousy and resentment

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: An aspiring Paralympian goes on a date with a former footballer, while a double divorcee hopes to make it third time lucky, if her long list of very specific requirements do not hold her back. A car salesman ponders how to raise the subject of BDSM on his first date with a primary school teacher, and a previous visitor to the bar returns for a second try

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: When Cpt Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Fantasy adventure based on the video game, starring Milla Jovovich, Tony Jaa and Ron Perlman

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson welcomes a pansexual Twitch streamer from Manchester hoping to make a connection outside of the virtual world and a bondage enthusiast from Shropshire looking for a silver fox who will share her distinctive tastes in the bedroom

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: A romp through the Naked Attraction archive, celebrating the celibate and the pickers who entered the studio with their virginity very much intact. The show also catches up with memorable beginners, including London dancer Raheem, who wanted a man for the dance floor and the bedroom, and Essex artist Bethany, who wanted to pop her lesbian cherry

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including The Yorkshire Vet, Britains Got Talent, Dynamo: Beyond Belief and The Nest. Plus, they offer thoughts on news coverage of Prime Minister Boris Johnsons COVID-19 recovery and President Donald Trumps various proclamations

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: A major crisis involving another boat means its all hands on deck, with tensions between Danni and Keith at an all-time high. A crew member makes a dramatic exit, leaving everyone reeling

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Three animated shorts with Homer and the family as they get up to their usual misadventures during the festive season. Homer must deliver the nativity sermon after Rev Lovejoys car breaks down, Grampa vows to exact revenge on Santa Claus for breaking a promise and the Springfield residents celebrate Yuletide in their own chaotic way

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay forces everyone to take a family holiday on a houseboat on a lake as he aims to create wonderful memories that will last long after hes gone. For the kids, life on the lake isnt quite as fun as they had hoped, while Mitchell runs into an old flame and Cam cant go in the sun. Phil and Claire try to make the most of their surroundings by trying out some rather adventurous excursions. Comedy, starring Ed ONeill

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire realise that Alex may be more self-sufficient than they give her credit for when they drop in for a quick visit to her college, while Manny is determined to avoid a long tearful goodbye after Gloria and Jay move him into his dorm. Mitch may have accidentally accelerated a planned renovation, and Hayley gets an unexpected opportunity when she befriends a wealthy female member at the country club

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When Malcolm is robbed and wont reveal the culprit, Calvin and Dave team up to crack the case of the missing sneakers. Tina takes a unique approach to teaching Gemma self-defence

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Tina gets carried away when she tries to help Gemma with her first fundraiser as school principal. Dave aids Calvin in his efforts to win a special auction prize for his mother

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve and an elite team of rock climbers head to the desert of southern Oman to attempt the first ascent of a towering escarpment, hoping to discover the rare and elusive Arabian leopard

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve and the team battle through the jungle into the heart of Indonesian Borneo. They are on their way to meet experts who have discovered ancient cave art thought to be among the oldest on the planet. But they have also heard rumours that the mountain range contains further unmapped caves - and Steve wants to be the first to track them down, and whatever is hidden within

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve is on a mission to explore the Arctic at the most volatile and dangerous time of the year - the spring melt. Paddling through ever-shifting sea ice and kayaking the worlds largest fjord, he and his team are on constant alert for giant icebergs and hungry polar bears

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve travels deep into Yucatán, Mexico, on the trail of the ancient Maya. His team, including Mexican archaeologist Guillermo de Andaa, pioneering cave diver Robbie Schmittner and former Royal Marine Aldo Kane, want to explore secret caves known as the place of fear

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Gainsborough to Ely, along the way learning about a Victorian machine that changed shopping for ever and the poet Alfred Tennyson

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo begins a journey across Ireland, starting in the port of Wexford, where he takes to the seas in a 100-year-old lifeboat and discovers a hero of the American navy

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on the first leg of a journey from the coalfields of South Wales to the southernmost tip of Cornwall, travelling from Whitland, Carmarthenshire, to Swansea

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The adventurer reaches Sri Lanka, whose strategic location and tropical spices made it a target for invaders and colonisers for centuries. In the north he visits the scenes of vicious battles between the Tamil minority and the Sri Lankan army, traumatic events from which the population is still recovering. On his way to Bangladesh, he hitches a ride on a trawler, highlighting one of the Indian Oceans fastest-growing industries - providing prawns for the West. But as he reveals, it comes at a price for the environment

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The adventurer begins the final leg of his journey on the northern tip of Sumatra in western Indonesia, near the epicentre of the 2004 Boxing Day tsunami, finding out how the province of Banda Aceh has undergone many changes since the disaster. He also explores the illegal trade in exotic pets in the Indonesian capital of Jakarta, before heading for Australia, the final country on his epic journey. There he visits the unspoilt wilderness of the Kimberley region, meets a crocodile hunter and goes fishing with natives campaigning to stop the construction of a giant gas plant

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: Originally broadcast live from the Arctic, this series follows the struggles of polar bears living on this frozen tundra and highlights the impact that environmental changes are having on the bears and the changing world around them. Simon Reeve, Kate Humble and Gordon Buchanan examine the effects of climate change and the struggles these bears now face as the sea ice continues to melt at an alarming rate

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: The team presents more news from the remote Canadian town of Churchill on the edge of the Arctic. Gordon Buchanan meets the people who protect the town from polar bears, Simon Reeves goes to Greenland to meet NASA scientists monitoring the melting of glaciers, and Kate travels to Sweden to round up some reindeer

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: At Trinity College, Dublin, Michael Portillo discovers one of Irelands greatest treasures, and also explores the house and gardens of Powerscourt in County Wicklow

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Dorset, Michael Portillo visits Brownsea Island, where Robert Baden Powell began the scout movement in the early 20th century. Joining a group of present scouts, the presenter learns to build a bivouac and finds out what it is about scouting that still appeals to boys - and girls - today. In the New Forest, Michael searches out some unsung heroes of the First World War - the ponies who became war horses - and hears their story from a commoner who runs a stable and riding school. Then in Bournemouth, the one-time MP investigates a very British institution - the beach hut

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his Edwardian Bradshaws guide, Michael Portillo conducts important research in an historic tea room, built by an Edwardian immigrant to the city of York. In Leeds he discovers the citys textile heritage, and also investigates Bradfords musical heritage

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo arrives in Croydon, where he hears the story of a mixed-race composer who was once celebrated but is now forgotten. At Three Bridges station, he is delighted to find a recently built depot and its fleet of new Class 700 trains - and is given the great honour of washing one down. In Lewes, he makes a beeline for Charleston, the home of artists Vanessa Bell and Duncan Grant, and in Shoreham-by-Sea, Michael discovers how magnificent Edwardians in flying machines took off from the oldest licensed airport in the country

programme.title: Saraband for Dead Lovers
programme.desc: A woman trapped in a loveless marriage to the future king of England falls for an aristocrat romantically linked to a possessive countess. Period drama, starring Stewart Granger, Joan Greenwood, Francoise Rosay and Flora Robson

programme.title: Storm Over the Nile
programme.desc: A British Army officer resigns his commission on the eve of a campaign in Sudan to be with his fiancee. His comrades accuse him of cowardice, and when he learns his girlfriend thinks the same, he becomes determined to salvage his reputation. Disguised as an Arab, he finally has the chance to redeem himself when his friends are captured in battle. Period adventure based on The Four Feathers, with Laurence Harvey, Anthony Steel, Ronald Lewis and Mary Ure

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A Second World War naval officer is given the command of an old sailing ship to undertake a very important mission - to transport an Australian agent into enemy waters so he can spy on the Japanese. However, he finds the ship is falling apart at the seams and is manned by a crew that does not know how to sail her. Comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Ricky Nelson, John Lund, Chips Rafferty and Tom Tully

programme.title: Hangmans Knot
programme.desc: Confederate soldiers wipe out a group of Union troops carrying a shipment of gold, but later learn the Civil War ended the month before, rendering their attack a criminal act. The soldiers go on the run with the loot, but their worries deepen when they are besieged by bandits. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Donna Reed, Lee Marvin and Richard Denning.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: An ageing assassin is targeted by a mysterious young operative that seems able to anticipate his every move. Discovering that hes being hunted by a younger clone of himself, Henry needs to find out why hes being targeted and who the creator is. Action drama, starring Will Smith, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Clive Owen

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: A lawyer in 1950s New York is hired to represent a Soviet spy in a showcase trial designed to demonstrate the fairness of the US justice system. In the face of public condemnation, he argues against the death penalty, a stance that years later leads to his involvement in an exchange of prisoners in East Germany. Steven Spielbergs fact-based Cold War drama, starring Tom Hanks and an Oscar-winning Mark Rylance

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: A small-time crook collecting protection money for his gangster uncle hopes to rise in the world of organised crime, but he is troubled by his conscience and loyalty to his girlfriend. As penance, he takes it upon himself to control a trouble-making friends self-destructive impulses. Martin Scorseses drama, starring Robert De Niro, Harvey Keitel, Amy Robinson, Robert Romanus and Victor Argo

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: A timid man who feels powerless to change his unhappy life is surprised to find his new co-worker is his exact physical double, but that they are complete opposites in personality. To his horror, the outgoing new arrival begins taking over his life. Thriller based on Fyodor Dostoevskys novel, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Mia Wasikowska

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: The penniless grandson of a duke plots to eliminate the eight relatives standing between him and a vast inheritance. He shoots, drowns, poisons and explodes his way through his family tree, but his final triumph is ruined when his lady loves husband kills himself. Ealing black comedy, starring Alec Guinness as all eight potential victims, with Dennis Price, Valerie Hobson and Joan Greenwood

programme.title: San Demetrio London
programme.desc: A group of lowly British Merchant Navy sailors save the San Demetrio oil tanker after it was almost destroyed by the enemy, They brave fire and ocean to sail the the vessel 900 miles to the safety of a Scottish port. Drama, starring Walter Fitzgerald, Mervyn Johns and Gordon Jackson

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: A wealthy and ambitious cattleman plans to seize all the land surrounding his own. A peaceful rancher living nearby ignores warnings to sell up and avoid a conflict, and as he suffers a campaign of intimidation, he is forced to adopt violent methods to defend his livelihood. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Alexander Knox, Joan Leslie and Ellen Drew

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat
programme.desc: A female Russian pilot defects to the West due to anger at sexual discrimination in the Soviet Air Force. A US Air Force officer tries to convince the committed communist of the benefits of life in the West and romance blossoms - but the KGB are soon stalking the couple. Comedy, starring Bob Hope, Katharine Hepburn, James Robertson Justice and Robert Helpmann

programme.title: Turner and Hooch
programme.desc: A Californian detective investigating the murder of a local man by drug smugglers has only one witness to help him solve the case - the large, smelly dog that belonged to the victim, which is about to turn the detectives well-ordered existence into chaos. Family comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham and Craig T Nelson

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A young Russian woman who is the victim of domestic abuse reluctantly accepts an offer from the KGB, and soon becomes one of the worlds most feared killers. Action thriller written, produced and directed by Luc Besson, and starring Sasha Luss, Helen Mirren, Luke Evans and Cillian Murphy

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: In 1970s North Denver, a masked predator nicknamed The Grabber poses as a magician to lure unsuspecting children into the back of his van. Five youngsters vanish without trace despite the best efforts of Detectives Wright and Miller to identify a prime suspect. Their enquiries lead to Gwen Shaw, an abused girl who claims to have prophetic dreams about the missing boys. Horror, starring Mason Thames, Ethan Hawke, Madeleine McGraw and Jeremy Davies

programme.title: Berberian Sound Studio
programme.desc: An introverted sound engineer used to working on nature documentaries is recruited by an Italian director, only to find himself working on a violent horror movie. The alien surroundings and constant repetition of disturbing imagery begins to take its toll on his sanity. Thriller, starring Toby Jones, Tonia Sotiropoulou and Antonio Mancino

programme.title: The Way West
programme.desc: A senator and a veteran scout lead a band of settlers on an arduous journey across the great plains of 19th-century America. However, they face the prospect of reprisals from Native Americans when one of the pioneers accidentally shoots a child. Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum, Lola Albright, Michael Witney, Richard Widmark and Sally Field in her big-screen debut

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: With the mayor demanding action against outlaw Frank Masters, Clay Hollister searches the county for him. Western drama, starring Pat Conway

programme.title: 7th Cavalry
programme.desc: An army officer is branded a coward for failing to fight in the Battle of the Little Bighorn, and is unable to convince anyone that official business had detained him. In a bid to repair his damaged reputation, he leads a cavalry detail to retrieve the dead from the battlefield. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Jay C Flippen and Jeanette Nolan

They grow closer as they escort a celebrity dog around the country - especially when fate throws a crisis in their path. Romantic drama, starring Ashley Scott, Patrick Muldoon and Shelley Long

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: A woman looking for some time alone following a bad break-up arranges to spend Christmas staying with her uncle on his remote ranch. However, she discovers he has an unexpected houseguest - a spoiled Hollywood star who is staying on the ranch as research for his next role. Romantic drama, starring Kristoffer Polaha and Lindy Booth

programme.desc: Passionate artist Andys family has been building floats for Californias annual New Year Rose Parade for generations. When her father falls ill ahead of the occasion, she is forced to step in to oversee the construction and decoration of a lucrative clients big float. To make matters worse, said client is demanding young businessman Cliff, who makes it clear failure to deliver is not an option. Romantic drama, starring Rachel Boston

programme.title: A Very British Christmas
programme.desc: Opera singer Jessicas flight to her concert in Vienna gets delayed and she is stuck in a remote area of England. The only place to stay is a bed-and-breakfast in an enchanting village run by a handsome widower named Andrew. Romantic drama, starring Rachel Shenton, Mark Killeen and Isla Cook

Begrudgingly, she agrees to teach the businessman who is taking over the company everything she knows about its workings, and ends up falling for him. Festive romantic drama, starring Malone Thomas and Jason Burkey

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: Following the murder of an affluent couple, Al and Carrie pose as husband and wife to lure the killer out of hiding, and the ruse awakens old feelings between the former lovers. Al believes the case is linked to a series of homicides he tried to solve years earlier in Queens. Back then, the manhunt petered out when the trail of evidence went cold, and Eliot isnt sure theres much to investigate now either, so he gives the detectives just 48 hours to come up with answers

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: An ex-con is tortured to death in his car and Castle and Beckett discover that a bank had reported a break-in the day before the body was found, but all that was taken was one of the banks safety-deposit boxes. Esposito believes the owner of the stolen property is connected to the man responsible for the death of his former partner Ike Thornton. Detective Tom Denning is assigned to help in the investigation - and Beckett seems instantly attracted to him. Guest starring Michael Trucco (Battlestar Galactica) and Michael Ironside (Starship Troopers)

programme.desc: Eileen and Pat agree to end their fling, while Jodie issues a warning after Cilla calls pest-control to the takeaway. Molly finds looking after the Duckworths hard work.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Liam returns to a surprise when he finds Carla in charge of the factory. Eileen tries to find out where she stands with Pat and Leanne discovers the cost of big business.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: After reaching breaking point with being followed around by Buddy, Martin resolves to find a vet to have it put down, while Ruth finds out that Bert has been trying to make his own whisky. Clive is suspicious of Mrs Tishell and who she might be cooking meals for, Penhale makes a hash of asking Janice out, and Louisa and Martins therapy homework results in a picnic on the beach, where they are interrupted by local vet Angela Sim - who appears to be hallucinating. Comedy drama, guest starring Caroline Quentin

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: A wedding reception held on Elsinby Pier ends in tragedy when a fishing trawler sails badly off course. Meanwhile, Adam faces up to a tough decision and the staff at the hospital prepare for a new arrival as Jill goes into labour. Robert Cavanah and Amy Robbins star

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An investigation into the appearance of forged bank notes in Aidensfield leads to the discovery of a major crime operation, and Blaketon is persuaded to try a new image by Vernon _ with unfortunate repercussions. Meanwhile, Mikes suggestion that he and Jackie start a family is not met with the expected response. Rural police drama, starring Geoffrey Hughes and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The constabulary receives help from the Met to target a local drug trafficker, believed to be the boyfriend of Lord Ashfordlys sister Patricia. Meanwhile, a domestic drama involving Jackies friend and her baby leaves Mike torn between the loyalties of work and home, and Vernon plans to take advantage of a postal strike. Rural police drama, starring Fiona Dolman and Jason Durr

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Billy tells Victoria that Jack caused her mothers death so she sets off to find out the truth. Nicola tricks Jasmine in order to spend time with David.

programme.desc: Derek meets Liz from the bus station and whisks her off to the flat - unaware Linda is on her way over. Sarah and Jason have big news for Gail.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Ediths big day finally arrives, but will her enthusiasm convince the family that Strallans age doesnt matter? Meanwhile, Mrs Hughes anxiously awaits her results, Anna makes a breakthrough to help Bates, and Mary takes matters into her own hands to secure the estates future - but the personal cost could be high. Costume drama, starring Laura Carmichael, Robert Bathurst, Phyllis Logan, Joanne Froggatt and Michelle Dockery

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa helps out her ex-boyfriend Danny when he brings seven children from London to camp on Ruths farm - supervised by Al and Bert - while she and Martin plan a date on the advice of Dr Timoney. However, their night at the restaurant is interrupted when Danny calls saying one of the youngsters has gone missing. Things get worse for the couple when Martin uncovers a health scare at Jamess first birthday party that makes all the guests leave very quickly. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes and Caroline Catz

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Jackie is assigned to act for a businessman accused of raping a fellow hotel guest during a conference, but she is not sure whether to believe he is innocent or not. Meanwhile, Vernon and David are dismayed to find their finances have hit rock-bottom and find themselves forced to seek employment to pay their electricity bill. Rural drama, starring Fiona Dolman, David Lonsdale and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Heartbeat

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Anglers flock to the village of Solomon Gorge desperate to catch a giant fish that is said to lurk in the lake. Their peace is ruined however when hundreds of sporting enthusiasts descend on the area for the Psycho Mud Run. Following the bitterness, fishing hooks and barbs are discovered hidden within the race obstacles before someone is found fatally electrocuted. Barnaby is left working out whether his death was another part of a sabotage gone wrong. Detective drama, starring Neil Dudgeon

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Midsomer Parva hosts the revival of a traditional pagan festival, but tragedy strikes when curate Alex Dakin is burned alive inside a straw effigy of a woman. The body count rises as an apparent victim of spontaneous combustion, a budding photographer and a newly arrived schoolteacher are the next to be roasted alive. Keith Barron guest stars

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Hill investigates a series of mysterious deaths resembling the various martyrdoms of Christian saints and realises they are being instigated by a shadowy figure who presides over a sinister suicide cult. A local vicar seems the most likely suspect, but his own death rules him out of the investigation - and events culminate in a surprise revelation. Psychological thriller, starring Robson Green

Plus, an American tourist seeks help from the GP. Comedy drama, with a cameo appearance by Sigourney Weaver

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A Russian chess champion arrives to compete in an exhibition match, causing a crisis for the constabulary, who also find themselves on the trail of an exceptionally devious burglar. Meanwhile, David and Vernon face problems a little closer to home. Rural police drama, starring David Lonsdale and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An investigation into a cattle auctioneer puts Mikes career in danger when he finds himself under suspicion of taking bribes. The case also puts his relationship with his wife in jeopardy, culminating in a final, shocking revelation from Jackie. Meanwhile, Vernon attempts to bottle the secret of eternal youth

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Scott investigate the death of a racehorse trainer and suspect an aristocratic familys troubled history holds the key to the mystery - until a second killing makes them think again. Groom Jake Foley seems the obvious suspect, but as events unfold, the detectives inquiries gradually focus instead on the residents of stately Bantling Hall. Detective drama, starring John Nettles

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Local boy DS Ben Jones is a mine of information for his boss DCI Barnaby when a reclusive elderly couple are murdered in their home and a spate of killings appears to be linked to both a fatal road accident and the disappearance of a teenager 20 years earlier. A bitter struggle over plans to demolish homes in a road development ensues, and wild pronouncements from the local psychic ensure tensions in the village of Dunstan remain at fever pitch. Maggie Steed and Ben Crompton guest star

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The heroes in a half shell come to terms with their new roles as saviours of New York City in an animated series set shortly after the events chronicled in the film Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem. Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. Meanwhile, pampered rich kid Rod (Pete Davison) yearns to be a mutant and leverages his wealth and connections to achieve a dangerous dream

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. At the end of the first series, the eponymous spiny mammal (voiced by Deven Mack) learnt from black hedgehog Shadow (Ian Hanlin) that the original version of Green Hill no longer exists. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). Sonic and Shadow must put aside their differences and work together to repair the temporal damage and outwit diabolical scientist Dr Eggman (Brian Drummond)

programme.desc: Tinks is excited to visit the allotments again with her owner Charli to see how tall their sunflowers have grown. Charli says its a mystery - and detective Tinks sets out to solve the case. She quickly finds some footprints, a trail of petals and sunflower seeds, and some not particularly helpful gnomes. programme.desc: Theo stands his ground, Dana says the wrong thing, and Adrian is ready to be a dad

programme.title: Georgie and Mandys First Marriage
programme.desc: Georgie worries that hes leaving Connor out. Young Sheldon spin-off, starring Montana Jordan and Emily Osment

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy
programme.desc: Stanley visits Umbria, nicknamed the Green Heart of Italy. While this small, predominantly rural region lives in the shadow of its more glamorous neighbour Tuscany, Umbria has an ancient history that predates even the Romans. With the highest consumption of pork per capita in Italy, Umbria is a carnivores dream. From wild-boar hunts to incredible black truffle farms, Tucci explores the riches this land has to offer

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey in the East Yorkshire resort of Hornsea, famous for its distinctive pottery. In Hull, he discovers how one of Hull FCs star players made history as Britains first black rugby captain. From Hull, Michael hitches a ride on a fine-looking barge heading to Goole on a network of canals. At Spurn Point, Michael hears how along this coast an ingenious 19th-century RNLI invention saved many lives

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo has reached Lincolnshire, where his coastal railway journey from Middlesbrough ends. In Grimsby Town, he investigates a new stage in the towns history - as a maintenance base for some of the largest wind farms in the world. In neighbouring Cleethorpes, Michael rides on the Cleethorpes Coast Light Railway, pulled by a miniature steam locomotive. Later, Michael makes for a curious and wild stretch of coastline at Humberston

programme.title: Joyride
programme.desc: A headstrong solicitor plans to offload her new born baby to her sister, but her ploy is derailed when she accidentally ends up on the run in a taxi with a vulnerable but opinionated young boy. Comedy drama, starring Olivia Colman

programme.title: Other Voices
programme.desc: Annie MacManus, Huw Stephens and MayKay present performances by rising star Jacob Alon, making their St James Church debut, jazz saxophonist Nubya Garcia and New York rockers Been Stellar. Dublin rapper Curtisy plays the IMRO Other Room

programme.title: Disco: Soundtrack of a Revolution
programme.desc: The story of the global music phenomenon, beginning with its roots in the gay and black communities in the loft apartments and basement bars of 1970s New York when a new generation of DJs pioneered a distinct sound and a new way of spinning records. As the city - and the country - was mired in political and economic misery, these underground clubs represented a form of escapism, with pulsating, hedonistic dancefloors defined by a sense of sexual liberation

programme.desc: Selby, Costello and Iris all seem to be thriving their new home, until disappointing news disrupts their dreams of a truly conventional family life. programme.title: The Thousand and One Musical Lives of Fleetwood Mac
programme.desc: A look at the extraordinary musical longevity of the British-American rock band, which begin in 1967 under the leadership of guitarist Peter Green. It was when Lindsey Buckingham and Stevie Nicks joined in 1974 that the band reached superstardom with the releases of albums including Rumours and Tusk, but the group was riven with internal problems due to affairs and drug abuse

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.desc: Fleetwood Mac reveal how private turmoil acted as a catalyst in the creation of Rumours, their Grammy-winning album from 1977 that went on to sell more than 19 million copies

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant travels to Venice, said to be the city with the highest concentration of luxury hotels on the planet. He discovers how a measuring error led to the building of the citys biggest swimming pool, tries out a 15,000 euro-a-night royal suite whose bed has been slept in by everyone from the Beckhams to Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall, and visits a hotel that keeps its doors open even when water floods to knee height. He also finds out why breaking a window once earned Ernest Hemingway a 10 per cent discount on his room

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Liverpool, cutting through cliches about football and the Beatles to explore its less-celebrated treasures. Among his destinations are a 1930s banking building that has remained unaltered since closing in 2007, a well-appointed set of toilets and a recording studio hidden in a bar. He also discovers which former dictator once spent Christmas in the city

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky heads to Philadelphia to deal with the fallout from Willie Thompsons recent liquor fiasco, but it becomes clear Henrys parents are powerful people and determined to get answers about the death of their son. Meanwhile, Kessler is detained by Agent Knox, who uses physical and psychological tactics to elicit information about Nuckys organisation, while Gillians life continues to spiral out of control as her heroin addiction leads her to take desperate measures. In Cicero, Van Alden is recruited by the Capones to pay an election-day visit to local factory workers

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: After a cautious reunion with Margaret in New York City, Nucky heads to Tampa to work out the details of his investment with Bill McCoy and reconnects with speakeasy owner Sally Wheet. Meyer Lansky decides to go it alone on his land deal when Lucky Luciano gets spooked by an investor with ties to Joe Masseria. In Atlantic City, Harrow returns from exile and makes a confession to ailing war veteran Sagorsky, Chalky takes his frustrations out on Daughter, and Knox finds a new way to gain Elis trust

programme.desc: A robbery gone wrong leads to the death of Danvers bride-to-be while trying on a wedding dress. Once again, Pembleton and Bayliss disagree on theories of the crime

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Daenerys receives an unexpected visitor, while Jon faces resistance and Tyrion plans the conquest of Westeros. Cersei gathers her allies, Arya has a reunion with old friends and Sam risks his career and life

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Documentary following stately home owners who hire out their estates to earn extra income, and the clients who pay to use their properties for functions including stag parties, weddings and hunting trips. The programme explores how the reality of life in Britains grand houses is often less glamorous than it appears, as proprietors struggle to maintain crumbling buildings and pay utility bills, and examines the modern-day divide between domestic staff and their employers. Featuring life at Chillingham Castle, Maunsel House, Carlton Towers and Muncaster Castle

programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges
